document.full_text: new research shows chronic users of acetaminophen, a top-selling painkiller known as tylenol in the u.s. and paracetamol in europe, are at slightly increased risk for blood cancers.
document.title: acetaminophen tied to blood cancers
lines_and_colors: new research shows chronic users of acetaminophen, a top-selling painkiller known as tylenol in the u.s. and paracetamol in europe, are at slightly increased risk for blood cancers.
